Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1967...
Injured on 7/23/1968 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/16/1970 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/25/1970 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1971, off Gary Gentry (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/1971, off Mel Stottlemyre (NYY)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (A) on 4/23/1971...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 8/30/1975...
Had 25-game hitting streak snapped on 9/27/1975...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1977, hitting .533 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 6/8/1980...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 8/19/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1982, hitting .419 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/10/1982, off Terry Leach (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1982, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1982, hitting .571 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 9/5/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1985, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1985, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/6/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1987...
Injured on 7/14/1989 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/6/1990 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
